- Completely updated User Interface and colour-scheme.
- Updated chat with new design and functionalities including specific colours for Mentour and Mentour Admin messages and new “side to side” message design making it easier to see own messages.
- Preparation for coming user profiles and Premium features.
- Minor bug fixes

A big thank you for using Mentour Aviation app. We periodically update our app to make your experience better and hassle-free. This update includes:
- Aviation Forums
- Selective push-notification
- Facility to delete and flag inappropriate chat content

A big thank you for using Mentour Aviation app. When you are in conversation, speed and stability matter.
This update includes:
-Listing Forums based on last 12 hour activity
-Setting Platinum/Gold/Silver/Standard crowns to users based on like count
-Provision to send email to other users on tapping their email in the profile screen
-Option to set email, age and gender as private from profile page
-Change thumbnail based on user crown
- Minor bug fixes

A big thank you for using Mentour Aviation app. We periodically update our app to make your experience better and hassle-free.

Be a premium user to access the following features :
• Ask questions to Mentour during Live Streaming
• Option to stream videos
• View the full Profile of other users
